vulnerabilities.title: Prototype pollution in ag-grid-community via the _.mergeDeep function
vulnerabilities.description: ag-grid-community v31.3.2 and ag-grid-enterprise v31.3.2 were discovered to contain a prototype pollution via the _.mergeDeep function. This vulnerability allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via injecting arbitrary properties. Prior versions were also found to be affected.

vulnerabilities.title: ag-grid packages vulnerable to Prototype Pollution
vulnerabilities.description: ag-grid-enterprise v31.3.2 was discovered to contain a prototype pollution via the component _ModuleSupport.jsonApply. This vulnerability allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via injecting arbitrary properties.
